# portkey_guardrails (Data Source)

Use this data source to get a list of Portkey guardrails.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `workspace_id` (String) Workspace ID to filter guardrails. Required due to API permission requirements.

### Read-Only

- `guardrails` (Attributes List) List of guardrails. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--guardrails))

<a id="nestedatt--guardrails"></a>
### Nested Schema for `guardrails`

Read-Only:

- `created_at` (String) Timestamp when the guardrail was created.
- `id` (String) Guardrail identifier (UUID).
- `name` (String) Human-readable name for the guardrail.
- `slug` (String) URL-friendly identifier for the guardrail.
- `status` (String) Status of the guardrail (active, archived).
- `updated_at` (String) Timestamp when the guardrail was last updated.
- `workspace_id` (String) Workspace ID the guardrail belongs to.
